p: The health trajectory of each SSP has implications for achieving the SDGs, particularly SDG 3, which centers on health. While we do not include quantitative projections, and cannot say whether each target will definitively be met under a particular SSP, we can suggest that based on the health-related challenges experienced under each SSP, some SSPs are more likely to meet SDG targets than others. While all SDG 3 targets have a connection to climate change, there are several targets in particular that are likely to be particularly affected by health system responses to climate change outlined above ( Figure 9).
